subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] A little story in Romanized QS
msgSnippet: ... Here is the two stories in QS. I had to guess at some of Johns meaning, since he mixed Roman Letters with QS letter names, but I looked at both versions
messageBody:
John Cowan wrote:
>>[two stories]

Here is the two stories in QS. I had to guess at some of Johns' meaning,
since he mixed Roman Letters with QS letter names, but I looked at both
versions converted, and I think I got it right. I guess you can't check
this yourself, John, because you don't feel comfortable with QS?

Anyway, thanks for doing this. Originally I mixed up the stories and put
the NZ one first, and I was thinking "man, his dialect is really
different than what I'm used to reading!" I don't read QS to make a
definitive judgment. I struggle with QS, so I can't read either passage
fluently.

John's dialect

H saHarli wind n H san war dispjMtN wic waz H strYNgar, wen a trAvalar kEm
alYN rApt in a wYrm klOk. HE agrId HAt H wan hM farst saksIdad in mEkN H
trAvalar tEk hiz klOk v SUd b kansidard strYNgar HAn H aHar. Hen H
saHarli blM
Az hyrd Az hI kUd, bat H mYr hI blM, H mYr klOsli H trAvalar rApt hiz klOk
arQnd him, n At lAst H saHarli gEv ap H atempt. Hen H san SOn Qt wYrmli, n
imIdIali H trAvalar tUk Yf hiz klOk. n sO H saHarli waz abliJd tM kanfes
HAt H
san waz H strYNgar v H tM.

New Zealand dialect

H syHarli wand n H syn war daspjMtN wac waz H stroNgar, wEn a trevly
kAEm aloN
rept an a wOm klQk. HAE agrId Hat H wyn hM farst syksadad an mAEkN H trevly
tAEk of haz klQk of SUd b kansasad stroNgar Han H yHy. HEn H syHarli blM ez
hyrd ez hI kUd, bat H mOr hI blM, H mOr H trevly rept haz klQk arAOnd ham, n
et lyst H syHarli gAIv yp H atEmpt. HEn H syn SOn AOt wOmli, n amIdIatli H
trevly tUk yf haz klQk. n sQ H syHarli waz ablyEJd tM kanfEs Hat H syn waz H
stroNgar v H tM.
